title: Moroccan ksra
ingredients: ['200ml (7 fl oz) water', '300g (11 oz) bread flour', '100g (4 oz) semolina flour', '1 teaspoon anise seed', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', '2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds (optional)']
